docs.snippet: With down-ballot candidates seeking to distance themselves from their party’s nominee, the Republican majority in the House is looking safe....
docs.lead_paragraph: With down-ballot candidates seeking to distance themselves from their party’s nominee, the Republican majority in the House is looking safe.

headline.main: How House Republicans May Survive Donald Trump

docs.snippet: Speaking in West Bend, Wis., Mr. Trump accused Hillary Clinton of complicity in violence against the police and blamed Democrats for the plight of black neighborhoods....
docs.lead_paragraph: Speaking in West Bend, Wis., Mr. Trump accused Hillary Clinton of complicity in violence against the police and blamed Democrats for the plight of black neighborhoods.
docs.abstract: Republican Presidential nominee Donald J Trump holds rally in West Bend, Wis, in front of nearly all-white crowd, at which he blames Democrats and his rival Hillary Clinton for violence and economic strife in black communities; Trump's law and order message includes vow to increase number of police officers patrolling city streets in poor and black neighborhoods.

headline.main: Trump, Rallying White Crowd for Police, Accuses Democrats of Exploiting Blacks
headline.print_headline: Trump Rallies White Crowd in Wisconsin for the Police

byline.contributor: John Eligon contributed reporting from Milwaukee.

docs.snippet: Mr. Ailes is aiding Mr. Trump’s team as it turns its attention to the first debate with Hillary Clinton on Sept. 26 on Long Island....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Ailes is aiding Mr. Trump’s team as it turns its attention to the first debate with Hillary Clinton on Sept. 26 on Long Island.
docs.abstract: Roger Ailes, former head of Fox News who left network following accusations of sexual harassment against employees, will advise Donald J Trump in upcoming presidential debates; Ailes's exact role in campaign is unclear, but should Fox News anchor be chose as moderator, his insider knowledge of network could give Trump edge.

headline.main: Roger Ailes Is Advising Donald Trump Ahead of Presidential Debates
headline.print_headline: Ousted Fox News Chairman Is Advising Trump Before Presidential Debates

byline.original: By MAGGIE HABERMAN and ASHLEY PARKER

docs.snippet: In a story Aug. 18 about Donald Trump's first national security briefing as a presidential candidate, The Associated Press reported erroneously the title of Michael Flynn. He is retired Lt. Gen. Michael Flynn, not Lt. Gen. Michael Flynn....
docs.lead_paragraph: In a story Aug. 18 about Donald Trump's first national security briefing as a presidential candidate, The Associated Press reported erroneously the title of Michael Flynn. He is retired Lt. Gen. Michael Flynn, not Lt. Gen. Michael Flynn.

docs.snippet: Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump said if elected he would force top administration officials to sign a pledge not to accept speaking fees from corporations with registered lobbyists or foreign countries for five years after leaving off...
docs.lead_paragraph: Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump said if elected he would force top administration officials to sign a pledge not to accept speaking fees from corporations with registered lobbyists or foreign countries for five years after leaving office.

headline.main: Trump Says He Would Bar Top Aides From Accepting Speaking Fees
headline.print_headline: Trump Says He Would Bar Top Aides From Accepting Speaking Fees

docs.snippet: Naming Stephen K. Bannon the campaign’s chief executive completed a merger between the most strident elements of the conservative news media and Mr. Trump’s campaign....
docs.lead_paragraph: Naming Stephen K. Bannon the campaign’s chief executive completed a merger between the most strident elements of the conservative news media and Mr. Trump’s campaign.
docs.abstract: Donald Trump names Stephen K Bannon as his new campaign chief and appoints veteran pollster and strategist Kellyanne Conway as campaign manager; Bannon is chairman of conservative Breitbart News website; Republican party veterans react with anger and dismay at choice, as it indicates that Trump is unlikely to conduct orthodox presidential campaign.

headline.main: Donald Trump Appoints Media Firebrand to Run Campaign
headline.print_headline: In Appointment, Trump Scuttles a Gentler Tone

byline.original: By JONATHAN MARTIN, JIM RUTENBERG and MAGGIE HABERMAN
